ProjectTitle: Advancing DNA-based antibody therapeutics through evaluation and characterization of in vivo expression, complex antibody formats, and delivery formulations
InitialFeedbackHistory: 05/05/2022 2. Please note that physical samples are also considered data that you can include in the table 4. Please contact onderzoek2bergen@kuleuven.be if you like to discuss this in more detail.
